Text: Well, let's see. Divorced has more than one file uploaded, so perhaps this is legit. If it is, I'll be sure to let you all know cause even if it's low quality, I just want a REAL copy.

I also uploaded a very small torrent containing the NZB files you can import into your newsreader to get this CAM version yourself.  It comes with PARs for error correction.  You can download a single RAR file and use WinRAR to see if it requires a password.  I find the USENET a bit faster than torrents most of the time.  Just click on my name above to see the NZB file download.  By the way, did I get hit after I uploaded this torrent:  Hurricane Electric & RapidSwitch tried to eat up all my upload bandwidth but I cut them off at my router.  Thank God for PeerGuardian.
same here man they were trying to eat all my upload too. Thank you peer guardian...

This is legit but fuzzy.
Use VirtualDub to sharpen.
Seeing this flick on the big screen was great.
Watching a fuzzy cam is tedious.

You only get one good look at the monster's
face in the entire movie. The cam is so fuzzy
you don't even get that.
